# Do NOT edit json files
edit the googleSheet, then "npm run ..."

## localization
tool: toolloc
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/122F4RZYbeBNl10tjWZYjimDzUazSMN1jyQaatOtxSR8

```bash
  "npm run loc"     to update all json files => public/locales
  "npm run loc en"  to update english only  
```

## buttons
tool; toolbtn
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1q7X86GjY9ULTf3P8AH4fdjl6nPc0JADQaWQWlP798sc

```bash
  "npm run btn" to update json files => src/config
```
## timeview buttons
tool: tooltv
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-aKx4qxKP-cK0Tq5XyMW0G4fa_BBc8go6cWh8kyYydI

```bash
  "npm run tv" to update tv.json file => rc/config
```
## space levels
tool: toolcosmos
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pWIrnNb7jKis5M0ftDJ9CvAgVUytXaKW41-dquWfS5I

```bash
  "npm run cosmos" to update cosmos.json file => public/cosmos
```
## database timeMarks (dbtm)
tool: toolbtn
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1OGOFf6rSTcJCxB9-EVVoeDD6fp9_ZVbqdN9mx2IeUzo

```bash
  "npm run dbtm" to update dbtm.json file => src/public
```
